titleStmt.title: Englands unhappy changes, or Suddaine alteration. Wherein is contained two treatises, and one petition. The first concernes the sweet blessing of peace, which we lately injoyed. The second concerns the troubles and distractions which this whole kingdom is now in, by reason of the perilous times. The third is Englands petition to heaven for peace / written for the benefit of all them that have a true desire to live at peace by Lavvrence Price.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Grove on Snow-Hill, neere the Sarazens Head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
